group_1.textRight: Did you miss out on your big chance?

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's right...@I don't know what was wro—

group_1.textRight: Make a contract with me@and become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Don't you ever quit?@Can't you see I'm depressed?
At least try to pretend like you@understand how other people feel!

group_1.textRight: In that case, it would be best to@eliminate the source of your stress, no?
If you become a Magical Girl,@I can grant any wish you want.

group_1.textLeft: Fine! I'll do it!@I'll become a Magical Girl already!

group_1.textRight: All right then, what will you wish for?@You want your restaurant to do well?

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hold on! Wait!@Don't decide for me!
The food we serve at Walnut's is@already great!
All I need is the chance to have more people@try it...
If I get that chance, I'm sure we'll @get tons of new customers.
I want a chance to have more people@try our food!

group_1.textCenter: We've got a real problem on our hands...
We only have a week left before the@student council exchange party...
And we have to find a new caterer!@I can't think of any other good options…
[chara:800100:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json]We've got no choice.@We're going to have to take our chances.

group_1.textRight: The chef we originally had lined up…
Got chosen to participate in a @cooking contest…
Are you still interested in cooking for@the student council exchange party?

group_1.textLeft: I'm so glad I became a Magical Girl!
I got the chance I hoped for right away!

group_1.textRight: I'm glad to hear that.@But I'm not a rabbit.
